title: Relaxing Bali Escape near Legian Beach with Daily Breakfast & Daily Lunch or Dinner
description:
Soak up the sun at this stylish slice of paradise, just a 10-minute walk from the famous Legian Beach. Ideally situated in the heart of Bali and only steps from a myriad of boutique markets, restaurants and cafes, this colourful sanctuary is the perfect launchpad to explore Legian and the nearby areas of Kuta and Seminyak. 

Surrounded by tropical gardens and featuring a large pool, three restaurants and bars and an indulgent wellness spa, this hotel makes it easy to relax, unwind and let your worries melt away in Balinese bliss.
offer_address: Jl. Padma Utara, Legian, Kec. Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

vendor_name: Astagina Resort Villa and Spa Bali
title: Two-Bedroom Villa Stay in Legian with Daily Cocktails
description: Escape to the award-winning Astagina Resort Villa and Spa, Bali, stamped with a 2019 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence and declared the Best Luxury Garden Resort in Asia at the 2018 Luxury Hotel Awards. Stay in a spacious two-bedroom villa for four, perfect for families or friends travelling together, with private pool upgrade available. This tropical paradise is nestled in Legian, just a short walk from Double Six Beach and within close proximity to restaurants, bars and boutiques. Your package is valid for four and includes daily buffet breakfast, two dinners, a daily cocktail each, daily afternoon tea and a one-way airport transfer.
location_description: Astagina Resort Villa and Spa Bali 2019
offer_address: Gg. Bulan No.8, Legian, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Stylish Bali Stay steps from Legian Beach with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktail
description:
Stay close to the action in Legian, just a short stroll from the golden sands of Kuta and Legian Beaches, with a retreat to this laidback abode inspired by the Sanskrit word nadi, symbolising flow, energy and balance. From world-famous surf breaks to epic sunsets, this hotel is ideally placed to offer you the best of Bali's coastal charm.

Step outside to explore lively cafes, street markets and the buzzing nightlife of Jalan Legian, or head to nearby Seminyak for boutique shopping and beachside dining. After a day of discovery, unwind by the outdoor pool, enjoy a relaxed meal with delightful drinks from Soma Bistro & Bar or pamper yourself with Balinese treatments at the Jiwa Spa.
offer_address: Jl. Lb. Bene No.168, Legian, Kec. Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361

title: Relaxing Beachside Bali Break
description: Enjoy a break at the All Seasons Bali Legian, perfectly located between the popular areas of Kuta and Seminyak. With the beach, shopping and entertainment all within walking distance, it’s the ideal break for couples, families or groups of friends. Included in your getaway is daily buffet breakfast, daily choice of lunch or dinner, a beer each on arrival, return private airport transfers and more.
location_description: All Seasons Bali Legian Hotel - Oct 2018
offer_address: Jl. Padma Utara, Legian, Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Pullman Legian Beach Seaside Indulgence with Guaranteed Suite Upgrade, Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
Experience the pinnacle of beachfront bliss in a lavish Pullman suite, located within a five-star seaside haven between Bali’s famous Kuta and Legian beaches.  Here, true island indulgence awaits in your expansive suite, with a spacious bedroom and sprawling separate living area, plus a deep-soaking bathtub perfect for romantic retreats.

This luxurious hotel feels private and exclusive, encircled by lush Balinese gardens that conceal three pristine pools, a soothing spa and an exquisite onsite restaurant. While some of Bali’s top day clubs and boutique shopping are a short stroll away, this luxury oasis offers every reason to remain within its serene grounds. 

Little ones can have the time of their lives at the kids’ club, while adults unwind with cocktails by the ocean-view infinity pool or rejuvenate at the Tjakra-7 Spa. Later, satisfy your every craving with a menu of international favourites served alongside picturesque views at Montage, or savour a more casual experience with a drink and light bites at one of the laidback onsite bars.
offer_address: Jalan Melasti 1, Legian, Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia

vendor_name: Astagina Resort Villa and Spa Bali
title: Award-Winning Legian Luxury near Double Six Beach with Daily Cocktails
description:

Winner of the 2020 Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice Award, this hidden Eden in Legian offers the pinnacle of relaxation within moments of iconic Double Six Beach and the beach club nirvana of Seminyak and Kuta.

title: Serene Legian Beachside Hideaway near Double Six Beach with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
Experience the laidback charm of Bali's Legian area with a stay just steps from the island's popular and vibrant Double Six beach. This boutique resort is the perfect place for those who want to slow down and relax in the sun, whilst also being positioned to get out and explore Bali.

Anantara Vacation Club Legian offers intimate and personalised service with just 28 rooms all designed around luxury and tranquil facilities. Spend your days lounging beneath the tropical foliage, float through the crystal-clear pool waters, and wander over to enjoy the sunset from the sands of Bali's most popular beaches.

Savour traditional Balinese cuisine by venturing out to explore the local eateries and bustling markets of nearby Seminyak. Relax in the resort's tranquil Hideaway Spa, offering a range of rejuvenating treatments, including romantic couples massages and steaming jacuzzis. Immerse yourself in the culture during a traditional Balinese dance class, or learn about Canang making.
offer_address: 14 Jalan Pantai Arjuna, Double Six, Legian, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Private Pool Villa Luxury with Daily Cocktails
description:
Abia Villa Legian achieves something rare - it feels secluded, yet sits only 10 minutes by car from Seminyak’s gourmet restaurants and Kuta’s beachfront paradise. Nestled between lush tropical jungle and the vivid Andaman Sea, Abia Villa Legian is a honeymooners' paradise that feels like it’s crafted just for you.

Relax at this stylish haven of tantalising, glassy all-pool villas with a fresh fruit basket upon arrival, daily à la carte breakfast, a daily cocktail each, two two-course dinners, two 60-minute massages per adult and return airport transfers.

**Travelling with family or friends?** Upgrade to a Two-Bedroom Pool Villa for four.

Immerse yourself in the culture during a traditional Balinese dance class, or learn the craft of Canang making.

title: Modern Bali Legian Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description: Experience the vibrant energy of Bali with a stay at Brits Hotel Legian. Nestled in the heart of Legian, this hotel is a stone's throw from the popular Sunset Road, a 10-minute drive from Double-Six Beach and 15 minutes from the bustling Seminyak district. Savour authentic Indonesian cuisine at the onsite restaurant, or unwind with a cocktail in the lobby lounge. For those seeking retail therapy, the hotel is within a 10-minute drive of the Beachwalk Shopping Centre. Adventure-seekers can also take a short drive to the Waterbom Bali water park or head to the iconic Tanah Lot Temple for a spectacular sunset.
offer_address: Jl. Sunset Road No.150, Legian, Kuta, Badung, Bali 8036, Indonesia

During your downtime, savour a treat from LG-27 Social Hub before heading out to explore Bali's lively streets. Located on bustling Padma Street, you're close to all the Bali buzz - sunsets on Double Six Beach, bohemian cafes, local markets and thriving nightlife. While the local area is dotted with vibrant bars and trendy restaurants, this luxurious hotel feels quiet and exclusive thanks to a ring of Balinese tropical gardens, hiding three pools, a breathtaking spa and onsite restaurants.
